mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, system_prompt, user_prompt_template, model_config, workflow_id, knowledge_base_ids, plugin_ids, status, created_at, updated_at FROM agent WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, name, description, system_prompt, user_prompt_template, model_config, workflow_id, knowledge_base_ids, plugin_ids, status, created_at, updated_at FROM agent WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, user_id, name, description, system_prompt, user_prompt_template, model_config, workflow_id, knowledge_base_ids, plugin_ids, status, created_at, updated_at FROM agent WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent (user_id, name, description, system_prompt, user_prompt_template, model_config, workflow_id, knowledge_base_ids, plugin_ids, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{systemPrompt}, #{userPromptTemplate}, #{modelConfig}, #{workflowId}, #{knowledgeBaseIds}, #{pluginIds}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE agent SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, system_prompt = #{systemPrompt}, user_prompt_template = #{userPromptTemplate}, model_config = #{modelConfig}, workflow_id = #{workflowId}, knowledge_base_ids = #{knowledgeBaseIds}, plugin_ids = #{pluginIds}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
